1.title: Decisions Decisions

11.content: When I was younger (sometime between 5 and 8 years old) I had a neighbor girl who was 4 years older than me. I don't know how it started but for some reason or another she started sitting on me all the time when no one was around. One time in particular was when she asked me to lay down on my bed face up and just stay still. I did as she asked and she stood straddling my feet. After a couple of seconds she dropped unexpectedly straight onto my feet. After she had finished laughing she got up and straddled my legs but a little higher (you may be able to see where this is going) and did the same again. After dropping full weight ass first onto my legs, groin (3 times), chest (4 times) and neck she finally got to my face. She dared me to stay face up while she dropped. I did as she asked and boy did it hurt when she came crashing down. She didn't get up straight away either she just stayed there for a while bouncing and giggling. Finally she got off and we played another game. I have more experiences with her although there aren't many as extreme as that although there is an experience which include her and her friend from across the street and another which include my neighbor and her mum. My neighbor is called Nicola by the way. Ill post again when I can.
11.title: My Ex-Neighbor

111.content: If you read my last post then you know that I had a Neighbor called Nicola (name changed for confidentiality). As I mentioned before Nicola had a friend called lydia (name also changed) who lived just across the street who was a year older than her so she was 5 years older than me. Nicola had brown hair, brown eyes and at the age of 14 was around 5 foot 3 and weighed around 120 pounds. Lydia had black hair, green eyes and was bigger than Nicola at around 5 foot 7 and weighing in at about 180 pounds. At the age of ten I was a scrawny 100 pounder who was 4 foot 6 (I have always been small for my age. Anyway when I was ten and they were 14 and 15 we were all at lydias house playing tekken on the playstation 1. I was staying overnight because Lydia was meant to be babysitting me and it was a saturday. Lydia's parents were on holiday for a week. I kept winning all the time against the both of them and Lydia was getting really annoyed at me. I was sat on the floor leaning my head back against the couch behind me where Lydia and Nicola were both sitting. Eventually after winning around my 10th match against Lydia she screamed in frustration. Nicola then said "ill distract him for this game so you can win Lydia". Lydia asked "what are you going to do to him" and without answering Nicola just moved off the couch and jumped onto my lap facing me. Nicola then started to move around a lot so that she could keep blocking my view of the tv screen whenever I tried to look past her. Luckily I managed to win by using the brief moments I could get a view of the tv screen. When this happened Lydia was really annoyed. She pulled my head back towards the couch and sat half on my nech and half on my face. Luckily I could breathe though as my nose was left uncovered. With that she said rematch and if I win she and Nicola would get off me but if I lost then I would be sat on for the rest of the day. Obviously I lost as I could not see what was going on. When Lydia finally won Nicola and Lydia started bouncing up and down with joy. Then Nicola decided to ask the question "I wonder how much he can take being under us?" meaning me. Lydia was all up for finding out. Nicola then got up off my lap and sat on Lydia's lap. This was extremely painful on my jaw and when I started to try to push them off Nicola grabbed my arms. Finally after about 5 minutes I got my break and they got off me. I had hoped for us to just go play a game but they had other things in mind. They figured that they would be playing a game of their own. Lydia grabbed my arms and Nicola grabbed my legs. They carried me to Lydia's bedroom and threw me onto their bed. Then Lydia used her school ties to tie my arms to the bedposts. I thought that I was going to be in for it now. Lydia sat on my chest facing me and said that every ten seconds if I hadnt got out of the ties tieing me to the bedposts she would move up higher and that if I still hadnt got them off by the time she was on my face then she would make me stay there all night and use me to sleep on. Nicola told Lydia that she was going to go home as it was getting late. After she had gone Lydia started the game. She counted to ten with me struggling as hard as I can to get the ties off. she moved up onto my neck another ten seconds and she got up, turned around and sat on my head facing my feet. Another ten seconds went by and she told me I had lost the game and that I had to stay there all night. She went into the bathroom to get changed into her nightie. While she was gone I was still trying to get the ties off. She came back in and said that if I woke her up tonight there would be hell to pay. She came in and just dived onto me. I had her stomach on my face which was really uncomfortable for me and apparently for her too as she got up to put blankets all around me so that it felt as if she was sleeping on a flat surface. She then turned her lights off and just dropped onto me so that her back was on my face. I never did wake her up and I never got out of those ties until morning.
111.title: My Neighbor and Her Friend

1111.content: Hello everyone. As you should know by now I had a neighbor called Nicole living next door to me. Now this was the only experience I had with Nicole and her mom. I was 14 and Nicole had just turned 18. I was staying at their house for the week as my mom was on a trip for some reason, not sure why. Well, Nicole and her mom, Michelle, had decided to have a few beers as Nicole had just turned the legal age for drinking. After a few too many beers and vodka and god knows what else they started to get a bit silly and giggling at little things. Eventually Nicole shouted "lets play hide and seek, Timothy your it". Me and Michelle agreed and so Nicole and Michelle went to hide. The rules were that I had ten minutes to find one of them otherwise I would be the loser and would be on again. If I found them both then they would both be on while I hid. So I finished counting and went off to find them. I found Nicole under her bed almost immediately as I could hear her giggling. Michelle was a bit trickier but I ended up finding her too in her closet. They were both pretty annoyed that I found them both because that meant they were both on next to find me. Anyway they started counting and I decided to hide in Michelle's bedroom on the far side of the bed where even if the lights were turned on it would be difficult to see me. I then pulled a quilt off the bed and covered myself with it just to make it a little bit more difficult to be seen. After around 5 minutes of being laid there I heard the two of them coming into the bedroom. I heard some movement as they were trying to look in all the hidey holes but then I felt Nicole step onto my stomach and walk up my body until she was stood on my neck and chest. By the age of 18 Nicole was an even 175 pounds as she had matured to her full weight and size. She had also grown to 5,6 foot. I was still only 120 pounds and 5,2 (My full size is only 5,5). So here I am being crushed again except I was trying not to make any noise as I really did want to win. What I didn't realise, even as Nicole moved a little further up to stand on my face, was that Nicole already knew I was there and was just toying with me. She said "Hey mom check this out". After Nicole said this I felt Michelle get up on my stomach and chest. This was actually a little painful as Michelle is 210 pounds. So when Michelle stepped on me Nicole started laughing. Michelle was confused and told her so. Nicole just said "I found Tim". She then stepped off my face and pulled the cover off me. I was shocked and so was Michelle for a few seconds. I expected her to be angry or upset but then she started laughing. "I cant believe I am stood on your stomach and Nicole was stood on your face, how did you manage to not make a sound?". Nicole said "thats nothing mom you should see some of the stuff me and Lydia have done to him, weve sat on probably everypart of his body including his face while the other person sits on their lap, we have slept on him, stood on him and even jumped on him". Michelle was surprised that all this had been going on without her notice "Timmy dear, I think I would like to try doing some of that stuff too". Nicole said "No mom, Tim doesn't ever have much of a choice in the matter". Michelle's face again showed surprise but then went to what I thought looked quite siniser "Ok then Nicole show me what to do".

112.content:
Here's my own experience. When I was 6 years old, I was left over at my neighbor's house for the weekend. The thing is, she weighs 500 lbs while I weighed 68 lbs and always breaks whatever she sits on. Her name is Dominica and is 42. Well one day, I was sitting on her special chair, the only one that doesn't break. Well since I was only 6 at the time, I was very stubborn so when she came walking into the living room and saw me she quasi-frowned.

"Tsukune why are you in my seat?" she asked me. I looked up at her since she was so much taller than me and replied,"Because it's the largest chair in the house and the comfiest and I'm not getting up."

Dominica groaned, but then smirked as she mumbled, 'alright', turned around and sat on me, crushing my small body under her very large butt. Dominica made sure to apply all her weight to crush me. I groaned as I felt myself flatten under her. She got up after awhile and turned back around to me while smiling. "So, Did you like being my cushion because I liked you being my cushion," she said.

I couldn't move because literally all of my bones except my skull was broken. She smirked and said,"I guess that was a yes. Lets go have some more fun." She picked me up and went to the bathroom. She pulled down her pants and thong and used the bathroom. After she finished, she grabbed me and used me as toilet paper. She then threw me in the tub and cleaned me so I wouldn't smell awful.

She then forced me to stick my tongue out and used me as a dildo for a good half an hour. She threw me on the floor and rested her feet on me. She called someone, which turned out to be my mom, and it seemed she was going to be gone for a week.

142121.content:
Danny was helping Maddie move furniture into the lab because she wanted to make it feel a little more "homey". They spent a surprising amount of time moving some chairs, tables, paintings and last but not least, a very large, comfortable looking sofa. After moving all that furniture Danny decided to take a break. So he laid down on the new sofa, which turned out to be so soft and comfortable that he fell asleep instantly.

"Glad we're finished with all that!" Maddie said after moving the last table into place and wiping some sweat from her brow.
"Right Danny?" Not hearing a response, Maddie looked around the room looking for him.
"Danny?" Maddie scanned the room, somehow missing Danny laying on the sofa against the wall.
"Hm... Guess he went upstairs to catch a nap." She said stretching and yawning.
"Maybe a nap isn't such a bad idea. It'll give me a chance to try out this new furniture." She then thought of the very comfortable looking sofa they had brought down earlier.

Scanning the room once again, she finally spotted the sofa and made her way over to it.

Does she see Danny before she gets there?
142121.title: Danny

1421211.content:

“I hope he doesn’t mind “sharing” this couch with his mother.” Maddie thought.

And so, she turns around and lowers herself down until her big butt is right on Danny’s chest. She gives him a good grinding until she got comfortable sitting on her own son like this.

“Who knew Danny could make out to be a nice comfy cushion? I think I might sit for a while. Besides, he might like using my butt as a blanket to keep him warm.” Maddie thought with a giggle before she starts drifting off to sleep.
